title: The best meal in Athens!
text:
A lovely restaurant in Plaka right under the foot of Acropolis Hill.
We had the best Musaka and Lamb in Clay pot.

title: place to be!
text:
Great walking neighborhood to be explored on foot. tons of restaurants and shops.
lots of places for traditional greek food.

title: Must See
text:
No doubt a must see attraction in Athens.
A guided tour greatly adds to the experience.
Get your tickets on line and go early (8AM) to avoid the lines

title: amaizng
text:
a must see attraction in Athens. Would recommend a guided tour to add to the experience. Come at 8 AM to get in with no wait.
Tickets can be bought on line

title: great museum, nice add on the Acropolis trip
text:
Worth the trip. Lots of artifacts and great way to learn the history of Acropolis.
Lines were short. no "skip the line" tickets necessary

title: Beautiful with great service
text:
Had an amazing stay at this hotel. We stayed in an Acropolis View suite.
The location couldn't be beat, right in the heart of Plaka and close to all the attractions.
The service was excellent and the view from our large balcony was breathtaking.
Breakfast buffet had a great selection. The pool was a bit cold and crowded, but lovely none the less.
Would definitely stay here again
